website_summaries.verdict: An aesthetically appealing, functional golf ball washer that works well for the game and would also make a nice gift or souvenir.
pros: Small and easy to take along
Comes with a clip if you choose to hang it
Has three strong brushes to help achieve a good clean
cons: There is a slight learning curve to using the cleaner
some say they need to unscrew it slightly to make it work

customer_reviews.title: Never worry about your Dirty Balls again
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning of each round of golf we all show each other our balls. That way we can identify each others balls throughout the match This product cleans my balls stupendously. I am proud to show off my balls at every golf outing. My balls are shiny and clean. My golf ball washer cleaner hangs off my golf bag and is the envy of the house pro. She's even cleaned my balls with Golf Ball Washer Cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Kevin

customer_reviews.title: love it!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife who it out on the course a few times a week. She likes everything to be neat and tidy from her clubs to her shoes to her cleats to her golf balls. She loves the gift and how it works- she has a pocket sized dishwasher soap in her golf bag – adds water each round she plays and voila !!! Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Clean 'em in the cart
customer_reviews.text: When you don't have a ball-cleaner on the next tee box, having this in your cart comes in handy. It doesn't scrub as well as the on-course cleaners, but it does the job. Use a some water with a spritz of Windex (or just plain soap & water) & give it a good shake. I don't recommend using the clip & hanging it off the bag. Just like any other strap, it can break. Keep it in the cart cup-holder.
customer_reviews.author: melendezTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boss as a birthday present. He loves to golf. He practices at home with his dog who go after the ball and bring it back. This portable golf ball cleaner will help in keeping them clean and is very easy to carry. Arrived in time and just as described. It's the close to the size of a bobblehead
customer_reviews.author: PATRIA

customer_reviews.title: this cleaner does a fantastic job, fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for my husband last year and he loves it. So, I am buying another one for a friend who is a golfer as well. According to my husband, this cleaner does a fantastic job, fun to use, he has to have it whenever he plays golf, very handy to have, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Recliner

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and brother in law absolutely love this item. I bought them each one. Since COVID19 the ball washers are not out on the course so these work perfectly! Plus you can use fresh water and a drop of soap every time!
customer_reviews.author: miller

customer_reviews.title: Awful!!
customer_reviews.text: 25$ for a ball that sits between the brushes and does nothing. the brushes don't rotate around the ball, the top, ball and brushes move all at once cleaning nothing and spilling liquid in the process. Waste your money on something else. Buy (The Twister ball cleaner) it's the best product on the market and nothing is close to it.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little ball cleaner. With most of the courses in the States not having ball washers due to the Covid 19 this ball cleaner works great...
customer_reviews.author: Arnett Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball Cleaner and Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: I have a friend that showed me this and I immediately ordered one. I am very happy I did. It performs exactly as I wanted it to. I just carry it in my pocket and then pull it out when I need it so I have a clean happy ball to putt. I would certainly consider this as a gift to other golfers.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Kim

customer_reviews.title: This product is garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Based on pictures depicting product, one would assume this things spin the inside brushes around the ball - it doesn't. Instructions indicate it should be filled with water and shaken, which does virtually nothing to clean the ball that you can't do by spitting on it. I bought it because courses removed ball washers due to Covid but this thing is grossly overpriced and useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Moynihan

customer_reviews.title: Keeping them clean
customer_reviews.text: With Covid around most places removed thier Ballwashers from course. Product works great.
customer_reviews.author: jerre

customer_reviews.title: Don't hit dirty balls
customer_reviews.text: With the China virus on our minds most ball cleaners have been removed from the course. Keep your ball clean and easy to see with this handy ball cleaner. I use mine at every T. Works well and makes my ball easy to spot from a distance. Good value here.
customer_reviews.author: James Bierman

customer_reviews.title: Everyone is jealous of me with this
customer_reviews.text: Since many courses removed ball washer during Covid for touching reasons, this is a great item. I use it multiple times each round. All my buddies are jealous. Several have bought one for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: Portable ball cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a fun gift. It has since been attached to golf bag and is handy for cleaning golf balls.
customer_reviews.author: Racquel Bursee

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: It works, and it’s sturdy. Could use a better, more rubbery washer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Annunziata

customer_reviews.title: Cleans golf balls well
customer_reviews.text: Everything that I expected: cleans quickly and works great! I would recommend this product to any golfer. It saves time cleaning and allows more time to play. Great package design makes it a perfect gift for my golfing buddies!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Wash your balls
customer_reviews.text: Love this, got it for a gift for someone and they were pleasantly surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J. King

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for a golfer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift for my friend who is a dedicated golf player. He used it already on a golf course and at home. He thanked me and told that he is very happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: not impressed just as well have not bothered to buy this item
customer_reviews.author: Andrea j.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item for keeping your golf balls clean. The item is small and portable yet fully functional with strong brushes. Came with a very nice package and works so good. Very happy with the quality and cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift to myself!
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying using my golf ball washer/cleaner. Since the golf courses have removed the golf ball washers, I have been very happy with how the golf ball washer/cleaner, keeps my golf balls sparkly and white, so I can find them!
customer_reviews.author: William Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Golf ball cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Play a lot of golf. Cleans your golf ball between holes and ball washers on the course. Ball washers have been removed from the golf courses because of the virus.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Clay

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift...so not sure how it works, but looks really nice
customer_reviews.author: Donna J Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and portable
customer_reviews.text: No info given as to which or any cleanser to add. Works okay
customer_reviews.author: JerMV

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work at all. The description is wrong and when you tell amazon that and return it they charge you a 5 dollar restocking fee. Complete crap and a scam. Don’t buy it. Use a tooth brush and some soap!
customer_reviews.author: nickpolisi

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the box
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for myself and have used it several times; does what it says on the box. Use it after each hole for quick rinse and the golf ball comes out nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Gift item
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for a friend who told me he liked it
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: If you are a golfer this is a must-have!! This product works great. Every time I get on the green I clean my ball before putting. It does a great job of cleaning my ball, looks cool and packaged nicely. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: GoodLifeForAll

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: The product was good but really doesn’t do much to balls. A bit messy and cumbersome
customer_reviews.author: Luis F Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and effective. Works as well as the course ball cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Baker

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I put in some dirty balls and it came out still dirty. The shaking action is not enough to clean it. Don’t throw away your money. Better to use wet rag
customer_reviews.author: Gary E.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars, Golf Ball Washer Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Nice product! Lightweight, gets the job done! I recommend it, Great idea to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product that does what it needs to do
customer_reviews.text: Great Product that does what it needs to do. Hooked onto my golf bag and use my water bottle to top up and clean the golf balls after each hole.
customer_reviews.author: A. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: $25 for a piece of plastic. This was extremely underwhelming for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Coltimus

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great when courses don't have ball washes on course.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home use and very good on the course
customer_reviews.text: I bought this golf ball washer for home use after the game, and it works perfectly. Really easy to carry around and operate, I cleaned around 15-20 golf balls at home after a busy day on the course. I also took it out to the course, and used it few times where there were very dirty and smelly stationery washers. Overall does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

product_meta.title: Golf Ball Washer Cleaner - Golfer's Best Gift Idea, Accessory, Gift For Men Women, Souvenir, Present
product_meta.description: Don’t leave the Club House without this handy accessory. Introducing the new portable Golf Ball Washer and Cleaner: tired of hitting a dirty ball - no more struggling – the Golf Ball Washer and Cleaner will ensure a clean ball while you are on the move, allowing you to make the perfect shot every time. The light-weight and durable Golf Ball Washer and Cleaner easily attaches to your golf bag using our nylon strap with carabiner provided.
feature_bullets: GOLF BALL WASHER and CLEANER – portable ball washer solution for home, golf carts and golf courses.
Tired of DIRTY balls – take this cleaner along in your golf bag – it will CHANGE your GAME. Clean golf balls increase accuracy and eventually improve your score, nothing like hitting a CLEAN BALL.
Handy Nylon STRAP with Plastic CARABINER. GOLF BALL CLEANER can also be a great promotional item, souvenir or gift for any golf course, corporate event, or tournament.
THREE HEAVY DUTY BRUSHES designed for better cleaning with a Cool Golf ball lid.
Buy for a friend or a loved one and save together.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars177 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
